question: Who has become the first Indian filmmaker to have his wax statue at the Madame Tussauds museum in London?
explanation: Karan Johar has become the first Indian filmmaker to have his wax statue at the Madame Tussauds museum in London. His wax figure will not just be launched in one city but will simultaneously head out on tour across Asia. Since his debut as a director in 'Kuch Kuch Hota Hai', Karan has managed a career that goes well beyond just filmmaking.
